title: The Silly Alchemist - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Psychological   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Alchemy   Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Beastkin   Bookworm   Brother Complex   Calm Protagonist   Cultivation   Cute Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Dense Protagonist   Doctors   Empires   Familial Love   Famous Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Gods   Honest Protagonist   Jack of All Trades   Lucky Protagonist   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Naive Protagonist   Narcissistic Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Overprotective Siblings   Quirky Characters   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Shameless Protagonist   S*aves   Underestimated Protagonist   Wealthy Characters

description:
My past life: Ordinary. Mediocre.

What I want in this life: Riches. Power. Influence.

My goal: To be a prodigal son. A waste youth with riches and power. Maybe even sidekicks.

My name is Ye Lang, I’m an alchemist, and I’m also here to squander as much money as I can.>
